Params: {3: 'Facing the final wave of enemies, Nanami charges at full throttle, grips her shield-axe tightly, and swings it to unleash an arc of electricity—'}
{3: 'After a thunderous moment, all the Corrupted lie motionless on the ground, slashed to pieces and silenced.'}
{3: 'Looking up, past the traditional plank walkways, a familiar crystalline wall towers between the rocky cliffs.'}
{2: "Tabula Akasha... we've returned to the underground of Kowloong—", 3: '28'}
{3: '—No sooner than the last syllable has left your tongue than the Tabula Akasha suddenly flashes red, unleashing a thunderous roar throughout the vast space.'}
{2: 'The Emperor?', 3: 'I\'ve conquered all sectors and transformed this space called "Tabula Akasha" into an incubator for cultivating intelligence.'}
{2: 'The Emperor?', 3: 'Sage, I collaborated with the Ascension-Network to successfully establish a world for mechanoids. And I have been waiting here all this time for your return.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The humans of this world... where are they?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Emperor?', 3: 'I have overseen the execution of the purge protocol against organic life, bringing about the future foretold in the prophecy.'}
{2: 'The Emperor?', 3: 'Please join us, immerse yourself in this Nihil, and bestow your grace upon us.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "No matter which world it is, Nanami's answer remains the same.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami will never walk a path of hatred devoid of love and hope. Nanami loves this planet.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Commandant, we need to get out of here. Let's go.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Tabula Akasha flashes violently with a red light. Amid the thunderous sounds, the mechanically supported rock formations begin to crumble.'}
{3: 'Nanami grabs her arm and charges straight for the glowing exit of the domain, not daring to look back even once.'}
{2: 'The Emperor?', 3: 'As for that human by your side...'}
{2: 'The Emperor?', 3: 'I shall personally see to their elimination—'}
{3: 'The space suddenly flashes with crimson light. The area beside them roars and collapses as a gigantic mechanical arm reaches out—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'You are not laying a finger on Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In that same instant, Nanami moves to protect you as the two of you dash into the luminous portal—'}
